name: 25°N 71°W
description:
Bermuda Triangle, 2023: An airplane is on its way to America. Suddenly the engines fail. At the end of the day there's a lone survivor: you, stranded on a desert island. Welcome to 25°N 71°W - a survival game where you have to mine, craft and build - to survive somehow!

How do you look?

Customize your character's sex, style, hair, eyes, skin and clothing ...

Mining

Exploit the resources of the island like trees, grass, bats and fish ...

Crafting

Use them to craft tools ...

Building

Use them to build a camp ...

Surviving

Sleep, search for food and drink - and survive ...

How do you choose?

Write your own story (if you have survived) ...
